scripts.script:
import org.pdfclown.common.build.release.ReleaseManager
final var USER_PROPERTY_NAME__DRYRUN = "dryRun" final var USER_PROPERTY_NAME__RELEASE_STARTPOINT = "release.startpoint" final var USER_PROPERTY_NAME__RELEASE_VERSION = "release.version"
final var releaseVersion = session.userProperties[USER_PROPERTY_NAME__RELEASE_VERSION] if (releaseVersion == null) throw new IllegalStateException("\"" + USER_PROPERTY_NAME__RELEASE_VERSION + "\" user property MISSING")
new ReleaseManager(project.basedir.toPath(), releaseVersion) .setReleaseBranchStartPoint(session.userProperties[USER_PROPERTY_NAME__RELEASE_STARTPOINT]) .setDeploymentProfiles("publish") .setInstallationProfiles("full") /* NOTE: Activates remote push only if GPG signing is configured. */ .setRemotePushEnabled(System.getenv("MAVEN_GPG_PASSPHRASE") != null) .setDryRun(session.userProperties[USER_PROPERTY_NAME__DRYRUN] != null) .execute()
